description:
When the chefs and Gourmet Hunters start holding their own against the Gourmet Corp. horde, the latter puts into play its deadliest trump card, the savage, well-nigh invincible Nitro! Plus, the ultimate match-up between Toriko and Starjun continues!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saiaku no Kirifuda! Gourmet Kai no Kaibutsu "Nitro"
Worst Trump Card! The Gourmet World Monster, "Nitro"!
最悪の切り札! グルメ界の怪物"ニトロ"
